basics.name: Unspecified
basics.label: DIRECTOR OF PIPELINE OPERATIONS
basics.summary: Innovative executive operations director with solid experience managing all levels of multiple projects including budgeting and administration

work.name: Unspecified Company
work.summary: Executive in charge of reorganized processes including gas control, engineering and design, project management, pipeline and compression systems, integrity management, and facility optimization and pipeline fuel process functions in a natural gas environment. Operated within compliance of local, state and federal regulatory requirements and managed project budgets.

work.name: Unspecified Company
work.summary: Led a team of project managers, procurement, environmental staff, and engineers to deliver results for a variety of clients from concept to closeout. Introduced a comprehensive Business Development plan to acquire new clients and navigated difficult permitting processes with the FERC, federal and state environmental agencies.

work.name: Unspecified Company
work.summary: Provided senior level lead management oversight for all phases of all construction projects. Selected and coordinated work of contractors and ensured all specifications and regulations were followed. Handled contract administration, permits, licenses and oversaw environmental and safety compliance.

work.name: Unspecified Company
work.summary: Held managerial roles including Leader of Construction, Damage Prevention Leader, and Supervisor of Engineering. Worked with business development to develop projects, monitored construction progress, led operations group that performs facility locating and leak detection, managed design, survey, estimating costs of capital and O&M projects. Also led a newly formed Safety Committee, developed a comprehensive public relations program, a Damage Prevention program and a process to streamline new customer main and service installation.
